body.p: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 1400 800">
Â <defs>
Â Â <radialGradient id="tokenGlow" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
Â Â Â <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,255,255);stop-opacity:0.3" />
Â Â Â <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,255,255);stop-opacity:0" />
Â Â </radialGradient>
Â </defs>
Â <!-- Device body -->
Â <rect x="25" y="50" width="1350" height="700" rx="30" fill="#1a1a2e" stroke="#4a4a5a" stroke-width="5"/>
Â <!-- Main Screen -->
Â <rect x="50" y="75" width="1050" height="550" rx="20" fill="#0f0f1e"/>
Â <!-- Timeframe selection -->
Â <rect x="75" y="90" width="600" height="40" rx="20" fill="#2c3e50"/>
Â <text x="105" y="115" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#ffffff">Timeframe:</text>
Â <rect x="205" y="95" width="60" height="30" rx="15" fill="#3498db"/>
Â <text x="235" y="115" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#ffffff" text-anchor="middle">1H</text>
Â <text x="305" y="115" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#ffffff" text-anchor="middle">24H</text>
Â <text x="375" y="115" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#ffffff" text-anchor="middle">7D</text>
Â <text x="445" y="115" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#ffffff" text-anchor="middle">30D</text>
Â <text x="515" y="115" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#ffffff" text-anchor="middle">1Y</text>
Â <!-- Wallet button at top right -->
Â <rect x="975" y="85" width="100" height="40" rx="20" fill="#3498db"/>
Â <text x="1025" y="110" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">WALLET</text>
Â <!-- Token universe -->
Â <g id="token-universe">
Â Â <!-- DOGE -->
Â Â <g>
Â Â Â <circle cx="575" cy="300" r="80" fill="#16213e" stroke="#00ff00" stroke-width="3">
Â Â Â Â <animate attributeName="cy" values="300;290;300;310;300" dur="5s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
Â Â Â Â <animate attributeName="r" values="80;82;80;78;80" dur="0.5s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
Â Â Â </circle>
Â Â Â <circle cx="575" cy="300" r="85" fill="url(#tokenGlow)">
Â Â Â Â <animate attributeName="cy" values="300;290;300;310;300" dur="5s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
Â Â Â </circle>
Â Â Â <text x="575" y="290" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" fill="#ffffff" text-anchor="middle">DOGE
Â Â Â Â <animate attributeName="y" values="290;280;290;300;290" dur="5s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
Â Â Â </text>
Â Â Â <text x="575" y="310" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#00ff00" text-anchor="middle">+12.5%
Â Â Â Â <animate attributeName="y" values="310;300;310;320;310" dur="5s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
Â Â Â </text>
Â Â Â <text x="575" y="330" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#aaaaaa" text-anchor="middle">$10.2B | 9Y
Â Â Â Â <animate attributeName="y" values="330;320;330;340;330" dur="5s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
Â Â Â </text>
Â Â </g>
Â Â <!-- SHIB -->
Â Â <g>
Â Â Â <circle cx="375" cy="200" r="70" fill="#16213e" stroke="#ff4136" stroke-width="3">
Â Â Â Â <animate attributeName="cy" values="200;210;200;190;200" dur="6s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
Â Â Â Â <animate attributeName="r" values="70;72;70;68;70" dur="0.3s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
Â Â Â </circle>
Â Â Â <circle cx="375" cy="200" r="75" fill="url(#tokenGlow)">
Â Â Â Â <animate attributeName="cy" values="200;210;200;190;200" dur="6s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
Â Â Â </circle>
Â Â Â <text x="375" y="190" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#ffffff" text-anchor="middle">SHIB
Â Â Â Â <animate attributeName="y" values="190;200;190;180;190" dur="6s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
Â Â Â </text>
Â Â Â <text x="375" y="210" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#ff4136" text-anchor="middle">-5.2%
Â Â Â Â <animate attributeName="y" values="210;220;210;200;210" dur="6s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
Â Â Â </text>
Â Â Â <text x="375" y="230" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#aaaaaa" text-anchor="middle">$6.8B | 3Y
Â Â Â Â <animate attributeName="y" values="230;240;230;220;230" dur="6s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
Â Â Â </text>
Â Â </g>
Â Â <!-- PEPE -->
Â Â <g>
Â Â Â <circle cx="775" cy="350" r="60" fill="#16213e" stroke="#00ff00" stroke-width="3">
Â Â Â Â <animate attributeName="cy" values="350;360;350;340;350" dur="5.5s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
Â Â Â Â <animate attributeName="r" values="60;62;60;58;60" dur="0.3s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
Â Â Â </circle>
Â Â Â <circle cx="775" cy="350" r="65" fill="url(#tokenGlow)">
Â Â Â Â <animate attributeName="cy" values="350;360;350;340;350" dur="5.5s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
Â Â Â </circle>
Â Â Â <text x="775" y="340" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#ffffff" text-anchor="middle">PEPE
Â Â Â Â <animate attributeName="y" values="340;350;340;330;340" dur="5.5s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
Â Â Â </text>
Â Â Â <text x="775" y="360" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#00ff00" text-anchor="middle">+45.2%
Â Â Â Â <animate attributeName="y" values="360;370;360;350;360" dur="5.5s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
Â Â Â </text>
Â Â Â <text x="775" y="380" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="#aaaaaa" text-anchor="middle">$1.5B | 6M
Â Â Â Â <animate attributeName="y" values="380;390;380;370;380" dur="5.5s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
Â Â Â </text>
Â Â </g>
Â Â <!-- FLOKI -->
Â Â <g>
Â Â Â <circle cx="225" cy="400" r="50" fill="#16213e" stroke="#00ff00" stroke-width="2">
Â Â Â Â <animate attributeName="cy" values="400;410;400;390;400" dur="6s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
Â Â Â Â <animate attributeName="r" values="50;52;50;48;50" dur="0.4s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
Â Â Â </circle>
Â Â Â <circle cx="225" cy="400" r="55" fill="url(#tokenGlow)">
Â Â Â Â <animate attributeName="cy" values="400;410;400;390;400" dur="6s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
Â Â Â </circle>
Â Â Â <text x="225" y="395" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#ffffff" text-anchor="middle">FLOKI
Â Â Â Â <animate attributeName="y" values="395;405;395;385;395" dur="6s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
Â Â Â </text>
Â Â Â <text x="225" y="410" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="#00ff00" text-anchor="middle">+18.7%
Â Â Â Â <animate attributeName="y" values="410;420;410;400;410" dur="6s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
Â Â Â </text>
Â Â Â <text x="225" y="425" font-family="Arial" font-size="8" fill="#aaaaaa" text-anchor="middle">$250M | 2Y
Â Â Â Â <animate attributeName="y" values="425;435;425;415;425" dur="6s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
Â Â Â </text>
Â Â </g>
Â </g>
Â <!-- Hardware controls -->
Â <!-- Left joystick -->
Â <circle cx="175" cy="700" r="40" fill="#34495e" stroke="#95a5a6" stroke-width="3"/>
Â <circle cx="175" cy="700" r="20" fill="#95a5a6">
Â Â <animate attributeName="cx" values="175;180;175;170;175" dur="3s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
Â Â <animate attributeName="cy" values="700;695;700;705;700" dur="3s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
Â </circle>
Â <!-- Right joystick -->
Â <circle cx="975" cy="700" r="40" fill="#34495e" stroke="#95a5a6" stroke-width="3"/>
Â <circle cx="975" cy="700" r="20" fill="#95a5a6">
Â Â <animate attributeName="cx" values="975;980;975;970;975" dur="3s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
Â Â <animate attributeName="cy" values="700;695;700;705;700" dur="3s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
Â </circle>
Â <rect x="310" y="675" width="30" height="50" fill="#95a5a6" rx="2"/>
Â <rect x="300" y="685" width="50" height="30" fill="#95a5a6" rx="2"/>
Â <!-- Action buttons -->
Â <circle cx="855" cy="700" r="15" fill="#e74c3c"/>
Â <circle cx="875" cy="680" r="15" fill="#2ecc71"/>
Â <circle cx="875" cy="720" r="15" fill="#f1c40f"/>
Â <!-- Buy/Sell buttons -->
Â <rect x="425" y="650" width="100" height="40" rx="20" fill="#27ae60"/>
Â <text x="475" y="675" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">BUY</text>
Â <rect x="625" y="650" width="100" height="40" rx="20" fill="#c0392b"/>
Â <text x="675" y="675" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">SELL</text>
Â <!-- Streaming panel -->
Â <g id="streaming-panel">
Â Â <!-- Panel background -->
Â Â <rect x="1125" y="75" width="225" height="550" rx="20" fill="#1a1a2e"/>
Â Â <!-- Streamer video area -->
Â Â <rect x="1135" y="85" width="205" height="155" rx="10" fill="#2c3e50"/>
Â Â <!-- Placeholder for streamer's video -->
Â Â <rect x="1140" y="90" width="195" height="145" fill="#34495e"/>
Â Â <text x="1237" y="162" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#ffffff" text-anchor="middle">Streamer's Video</text>
Â Â <!-- Timer and subscriber count -->
Â Â <text x="1140" y="260" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#ffffff">ğŸ•’ 2:05:33 | ğŸ‘¥ 2935/3000</text>
Â Â <!-- Chat window -->
Â Â <!-- Sample chat messages -->
Â Â <text x="1145" y="290" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#ffffff">User1: Great stream! ğŸš€</text>
Â Â <text x="1145" y="315" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#ffffff">User2: DOGE to the moon!</text>
Â Â <text x="1145" y="340" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#ffffff">User3: What's your take on PEPE?</text>
Â Â <!-- Chat input box -->
Â Â <text x="1145" y="620" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#95a5a6">Type your message...</text>
Â Â <!-- Live indicator -->
Â Â <circle cx="1325" cy="100" r="8" fill="#e74c3c">
Â Â Â <animate attributeName="opacity" values="1;0.5;1" dur="2s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
Â Â </circle>
Â Â <text x="1305" cy="105" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#ffffff" text-anchor="middle">LIVE</text>
Â Â <!-- Emoji reactions -->
Â Â <circle cx="1145" y="255" r="10" fill="#f1c40f">ğŸ˜‚</circle>
Â Â <circle cx="1170" y="255" r="10" fill="#e74c3c">â¤ï¸</circle>
Â Â <circle cx="1195" y="255" r="10" fill="#3498db">ğŸ‘</circle>
Â </g>
Â <!-- Reflections and highlights for a more realistic look -->
Â <rect x="30" y="55" width="1340" height="10" fill="white" opacity="0.1" rx="5"/>
Â <rect x="30" y="55" width="10" height="690" fill="white" opacity="0.1" rx="5"/>
</svg>
